products.name: TRIANGULAR BASED COPPER LAMP
products.description: A clever reuse of old gas copper pipe. This beautiful copper pipe lamp has been bent by hand into the traditional form of a triangular base using mostly reclaimed and recycled plumbing pipe. The copper is hand polished to a natural finish that will age and develop character over time.

products.name: Apothecary Amber Jar Candle – Christmas
products.description: Reminiscent of the days of Christmas in an Irish country house with the aromas of spicy and fruity baking wafting from the kitchen.

products.name: Coco 3 in 1 Cot Bed
products.description: Inspired by the spirited and imaginative stylistic elements of the ART DECO movement, the Coco 3 in 1 cot or crib is a classic, timeless designer baby bed with its’ playful curves and geometry.

products.name: Little Village Baby Bedding
products.description: Bunny & Clyde’s baby bedding is perfect for large cot beds and toddler beds. Our cot bed and toddler bed linen set is made from luxurious  200 thread count 100% cotton percale and printed with our signature ‘Happy Village’ design in turquoise with a strip of coral on one side and a black and white geometric print on the reverse.

products.name: Coastal Sands Rug
products.description: Designed by Patricia Murphy, Dimensions: 7′ x 2’4″ / 2.15 m x 0.7m, Materials: 100% Pure New Zealand Wool

products.name: CHRISTMAS CANDLE GIFT SET
products.description: The Christmas Candle Gift Set Contains: 1x Christmas Tree up to 40hr candle,1x Christmas Night & Christmas Tree Wax Melts. Our Christmas Tree Candle is hand poured using Coconut & Rapeseed Wax

products.name: Conical Lamp & Coolie Shade
products.description: This conical lamp base and matching coolie shade is our best selling lamp and make an idea Wedding Gift.

products.name: Map of Ireland Throw
products.description: With our Map of Ireland throw blanket you can wrap yourself up in Ireland no matter where you are in the world. It’s a particularly thoughtful gift for loved ones living far from home who may not be able to travel this Christmas.

products.name: Ballyshane Medium Cheese Board
products.description: A really one of a kind piece! Perfect for serving everything from antipasti, cheeses, party nibbles or just about anything you can think of!

products.name: COPPER LEAF PLACE MATS
products.description: Beautifully handcrafted each set of  Copper Leaf place mats are hand gilded with copper leaf to create a unique textured pattern on each piece. These gorgeous place mats will add an elegant and refined finishing touch to any table.

products.name: RELAXATION GIFT BOX
products.description: This gift box contains our Blush and Namaste candles, with a card of your choice and free delivery. If this is a gift, we can include a hand-written note in the card for you!

products.name: Coolree Rocking Chair
products.description: This Irish-made rocking chair will instantly become a treasured piece to enjoy for many, many years

products.name: Single wooden block with floating air plant
products.description: Wooden block with air plant elevated by a wire spiral. Block size 10x4x4cm

products.name: Zamioculcas Zamiifolia Plant
products.description: The ZZ plant is a modern must, a real instagramable plant. They’re a hardy specimen requiring little maintenance. Its glossy green leaves reflect the light and brighten up any space.

products.name: Chinese Money Plant
products.description: Pilea are extremely popular plants, with a cool minimal, chic feel, they’re at home in any contemporary abode. They have many common names; Pancake Plant, Coin Plant, and the Friendship Plant

products.name: self watering planter
products.description: Our new self-watering herb pot is designed to keep living herbs hydrated from below with self-regulating slo-flo technology. Keep the transparent Boskke Till Herb Planter topped up with water every week or so and the herb will look after itself. Soon you will be a proud owner of a convenient and fresh indoor herb garden!

products.name: Irish Heritage Vegetable Seed box
products.description: 4 Packets of Seeds - Tipperary Turnip (swede), Winter Roscoff Cauliflower, Daniel O'rourke Pea, Gortahork Cabbage

products.name: Kitchen Garden Box
products.description: Contains 20 packets of seeds, Beetroot, tomato, purple sprouting broccoli, cabbage, kale, carrot, swede, leaf beet, leek, onion, parsley, sweet corn, celeriac, dill, red stemmed celery leaf, parsnip, radish, spinach, spring and and winter salad mix.

products.name: 'The Gift of Spring' - 48 Organic Veg Plug Plants
products.description: It's hard to be apart during this crazy year, especially for grandparents and their grandchildren. Even separated, we can grow together with this fun seed pack!

products.name: Granny/Granda & Me! - Organic Seed Gift Pack
products.description: It's hard to be apart during this crazy year, especially for grandparents and their grandchildren. Even separated, we can grow together with this fun seed pack!

products.name: Medium Vegepod
products.description: Get growing in no time with Vegepod's easy to use, self contained, raised garden bed. It is the perfect solution for anyone interested in growing their own chemical free, nutritional fruit, vegetables and herbs.

products.name: Mixed Organic Seasonal Vegetable Seed Bundle
products.description: Selection of 3 packs of seasonal, organic vegetable seeds.

products.name: GROWBox VegTrug
products.description: This set will give GIYers everything they need to grow amazing veg from seed to harvest in one place. A compact raised bed on legs, complete with compost and seeds, we’ve taken all the stress out of getting set-up so you can concentrate on tending to your seedlings.

products.name: Kids GROWBox
products.description: This medium sized GROWBox is our selection of veg and flowers that are easy to grow and that your children will love.  We’ve picked things specially for our young GIYers

products.name: 4ft Square Allotment Raised Bed
products.description: Starter raised vegetable bed kit perfect for herbs and salads. This is a square raised bed that measures 4ft x 4ft x 7in high. These garden beds are ideal for any garden, allotment, greenhouse or polytunnel.
